content:
jameysharp commented on issue #6202:

I think this is a very helpful improvement. I believe the same description would also apply to fcmp, if you want to add it there too.

This is an extremely nit-picky detail but I'd prefer "i.e." written with periods. It doesn't actually matter but it bothers me anyway. :sweat_smile:

I'd like @cfallin's confirmation that this description is correct but I believe it is.

kevaundray commented on issue #6202:

I think this is a very helpful improvement. I believe the same description would also apply to fcmp, if you want to add it there too.

This is an extremely nit-picky detail but I'd prefer "i.e." written with periods. It doesn't actually matter but it bothers me anyway. :sweat_smile:

I'd like @cfallin's confirmation that this description is correct but I believe it is.

Now that you've brought it to my attention, I can no longer ignore the missing periods :sweat_smile:

cfallin commented on issue #6202:

I'd like @cfallin's confirmation that this description is correct but I believe it is.

LGTM!
